de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.collision

Class Hitbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.collision.Hitbox

  • public class Hitbox
extends java.lang.Object
    Hitbox class. Contains the hitbox to an image. Provides also flipped hitboxes. Can calculate if a hitbox collides with another hitbox.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hitbox(java.awt.Image image)
      Creates a new hitbox and its flipped variant for an image.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Polygon getFlippedPolygon()
      Gets the flipped Polygon of the hitbox.
      ImageOutline getImageOutline()
      Gets the ImageOutline object of the hitbox which calculates the Area.
      java.awt.Polygon getPolygon()
      Gets the Polygon of the hitbox.
      static java.awt.Polygon toPolygon(java.awt.geom.Area area)
      Can transform an Area into a Polygon.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hitbox

        public Hitbox(java.awt.Image image)
        Creates a new hitbox and its flipped variant for an image. Calculation will cost some time.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to create a hitbox for

    • Method Detail

      • toPolygon

        public static java.awt.Polygon toPolygon(java.awt.geom.Area area)
        Can transform an Area into a Polygon. Is also used for hitbox creation with the ImageOutline class.
        Parameters:
        area - Area to transform into a polygon
        Returns:
        Polygon equivalent of the given area
